name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Challenge failed" On November 28, a blogger in Guangdong released a video announcing that he would challenge to travel around Guangdong Province for 60 yuan. As a result, when he arrived at the first stop in Foshan, he was fined 70 yuan by the traffic police for riding an electric bike without a helmet on the motor vehicle lane, so the challenge failed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, local villagers in Fengjie, Chongqing said that after the village had received interest on land fees deposited in the Agricultural Bank of China for five years, the principal had disappeared.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
How strict is the application form for joining the party

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV.com reported on December 1 that the All-China Federation of Trade Unions recently issued a "Notice on Launching a Winter Special Campaign to Eliminate Wage Arrears", deciding to launch a winter special campaign to eliminate wage arrears in the national trade union system from now until before the Spring Festival in 2024.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 1, Hengshui City, Hebei Province. Wuyi Taihua Future City Phase III has been unfinished for more than five years. Owners wearing red vests with "Taihua Delivery" printed on them gathered at the sales office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 1, at the Liaoning Huawei regional headquarters, China Construction Fourth Engineering Bureau owed wages to migrant workers. The helpless workers could only endure the cold and sleep on the floor in the company corridor to demand their wages and rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"National Medicine Unparalleled"
Recently, the evidence-based medical research on Lianhua Qingwen for the treatment of mycoplasma pneumonia in children was launched in Beijing. It is said that the research shows that adding Lianhua Qingwen to conventional medication can accelerate the relief of clinical symptoms and signs of children, improve their lung function, and relieve their pain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xiyin Jiamin Logistics Industrial Park, Gaoming District, Foshan, Guangdong,
On November 28, Xiyin suddenly notified all hourly workers to leave the factory, including nearly 20 logistics industrial parks in Guangdong. The original labor dispatch contract between them and the agency should have expired on December 31, causing many hourly workers to leave within a few days of starting work.
Since yesterday, as many as hundreds of hourly workers have blocked the factory gate and slept on the floor to protest their rights, causing the warehouse logistics to be paralyzed.
Some rights defenders were carried away by the police

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 2, in Xianghe, Langfang, Hebei, a suspected road dispute led to a quarrel between a car driver and a truck driver, and then the car ran over the person.

content: On December 2, Xi'an Sanqiao Blue Light Park Huafu, owners of unfinished buildings defended their rights
